context.b: How do I properly clean up the station and store my ice cream?
context.p: To clean the machine you will need to be at the large sink space at the back of the classroom.

p.i: If any of these items are missing, call the maintenance number (453) 123-1827.

fig.title: Use plenty of soap and water

ol.li: Dismantle the parts of the ice cream maker and rinse them under running water.
Wet the sponge with soap and water and gently clean the base of the ice cream maker. WARNING: avoid contact between the water and the wire.
Take the damp sponge and wipe the inside of the base in case any liquid dripped into it, immediately dry with towel.
Wash each dismantled piece gently with soap and water, and place on the dish rack to air dry. Once the freezer bowl is dry, place back in the freezer for next user.
